## About
<hr class="solid">

I'm an Environmental Studies undergraduate student interested in data science and data analytics. I have an extensive background working with biological datasets and using analytics and science communication to describe the science of ecosystems to the public and the National Park Service. 

I'm currently working on advancing my data science and data analytics skills and I'm interested in <u>environmental</u> and <u>e-commerce applications</u> of data analytics.
